price: E não sejais como os que se separaram e discreparam, após lhes haverem chegado as evidências. E esses terão formidável castigo.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُواْ وَٱخۡتَلَفُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna tafarraqū wa-ikh'talafū min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-bayinātu wa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
